attributes.action: Hold an independent national inquiry into the systemic nature of UK rape gangs.
attributes.additional_details: In addition, the fact that its scale has only just come to light points to the culpability of many agencies including the CPS, local Councils, Social Services, the Police Service, Government etc. Therefore, an inquiry with the independence and power to investigate this issue across the fabric of this Nation is needed.
attributes.background: The widespread reporting of rape gangs in the UK across many cities over many years must be investigated as to its cause and connectedness.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
